title: 1525DRIVE-BY MEDIA: Why isn't the media playing Zohran Mamdani's Nazi salute on repeat as they did w
content:
1525 DRIVE-BY MEDIA: Why isn't the media playing Zohran Mamdani's Nazi salute on repeat as they did with Elon Musk? Why the double standard? posted 7 days ago by SweetBeef 79 comments award share report block @amuse @amuse • 7d DRIVE-BY MEDIA: Why isn't the media playing Zohran Mamdani's Nazi salute on repeat as they did with Elon Musk? Why the double standard? h/t @AB84
79 comments Sort by Top Top New Worst Old Save ElectronicSlurm69 75 points 7 days ago Because if they didn't have double standards they'd have no standards at all. permalink award report block reply BlackPilledMAGA 13 points 7 days ago Why don't we treat them the same way. Take the gloves off and throw out the rule book. A communist Muslim was just elected Mayor of NY by a bunch of third world freeloaders who want to use democracy to enslave the working class to pay their way forever. It's time to put away all shame, there is no high road left to take. permalink parent award report block reply guywholikesDjtof2024 4 points 7 days ago a leftist transgender shot the high road full of holes, and a blm rioter burnt it. permalink parent award report block reply Hanging_Chad 2 points 7 days ago which is worse? permalink parent award report block reply sully 1 points 7 days ago Double standards is like twice as many standards you xenobigot permalink parent award report block reply chargebeck23 -8 points 7 days ago If you have to cut the video at under two seconds to make it look like he's actually doing it then this isn't a terribly effective point. Also the roman salute kinda hits harder when it's from a white south african guy with an obsessive love of far right politics rather than a brown skinned muslim commie permalink parent award report block reply Wtf_socialismreally 8 points 7 days ago So, the same thing you did with Elon? And no, it absolutely does not hit harder than an Islamist when Islamists explicitly want to kill Jews today . You poor stupid bastard, your brain went in backwards when you were born. permalink parent award report block reply chargebeck23 -7 points 7 days ago Well yeah except when you watch the clip of Elon doing it there is absolutely no doubt as to what he's doing. You can even see his gayass little grin that he gets when he thinks he's doing something really edgy permalink parent award report block reply Wtf_socialismreally 4 points 7 days ago Oh, "my heart goes out to you" doesn't give you doubt to your retarded biases? Of course not, because you're FUCKING STUPID . You are literally braindead, you should actually kill yourself and save the world from your idiocy. Like I'm sorry mods, but this leftist Redditor really should run along and 41% himself. He has nothing to offer the planet. permalink parent award report block reply view 1 more comments... keeman 2 points 7 days ago The Roman salute requires a symbol of state for your arm to be pointed at.  So Musk and Mamdani version are both fake and ghey. permalink parent award report block reply AnonymousFrog 0 points 7 days ago YeH, he’s just waving here. Elon was trying to be an edgelord, but just came off as a sperg. permalink parent award report block reply Tookens 27 points 7 days ago Because they are presstitutes? permalink award report block reply drmrboy 19 points 7 days ago Why isn't the media asking why young Soros was funding him?  🤓 permalink award report block reply seattlerunner 13 points 7 days ago It’s (D)ifferent! permalink award report block reply Krat 11 points 7 days ago 0 arrests still permalink award report block reply Aggrieved03 3 points 7 days ago Why it continues. permalink parent award report block reply jiminycricket1941 11 points 7 days ago War is the only way out of this. We also get to throw faggots off tall buildings!! permalink parent award report block reply goldkeyboardwarrior 10 points 7 days ago Because the media knows Elon wasn’t doing a Nazi salute. But they knew a bunch of stupid people who each get a vote would believe them when they said he was. It’s hard for me to keep up on current events. permalink parent award report block reply TrumpsBigBalls 2 points 7 days ago No but his body movement resembled that of a Nazi solute because Elon was so rigid when he did it. Rigidity does not make him a Nazi it makes him weird. permalink parent award report block reply Trump454748 3 points 7 days ago Okay, so NOT a Nazi. Thank you for the clarification. permalink parent award report block reply modded 4 points 7 days ago We are at war and one side just posts snarky messages on twitter. permalink award report block reply learntocode 3 points 7 days ago In 1996 congress passed, and Bill Clinton signed, the Telecommunications Actof 1996. The law repealed all sorts of ownership restrictions on media companies - and we have seen the results ever since. The cable internet corporation owns the cell phone, the newspapers, the magazines, the book publishing, the radio station, the TV station, the movie studios, the video game company - literally everything is owned by corporations, that are themselves owned by corporations, that are themselves owned by large pools of hedge fund and retirement fund money - very very important companies in the public life of a nation, controlled by very few people. The deregulation that happened in 1996 with the Telecommuncations Act really set the stage for the horrific trash we call "media" these days. Add on top of that the disastrous repeal of Glass-Steagall (restrictions on commercial banks getting involved in retail bakning) - and you have Money Power just laying waste to this country. Why, it is almost like it was done on purpose! permalink award report block reply MR__K 2 points 6 days ago This is the puzzle piece i feel most people are missing. We have all these Monopolys now and we used to destroy Monopolys permalink parent award report block reply TPMJB 3 points 7 days ago Because Republicans actually care about optics. We shouldn't either. Let the RINOs live out the rest of their lifespans with their shitty ideals.
